subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the famous traditional dance of Rajasthan?
explanation_en:
Garba is a famous traditional dance of Rajasthan.
In Hindu culture, it is performed during the festival of Dussehri Navratri and is associated with the worship of Goddess Durga.
explanation_hi:
राजस्थान में गर्बा एक राजस्थान के संस्करण है।
हिंदू धर्म में, यह दुस्पद नवरात्री गोद्रादी का उपयोग होता है और देवी दोस्तान के धर्म में, यह दीवादी का उपयोग होता है।
C_en:
A traditional dance of Rajasthan is Garba.
In Hindu culture, it is performed during the festival of Navratri and is associated with the worship of Goddess Durga.
C_hi: राजस्थान में गार्बा एक राजस्थान का संस्करण होता है।
D_en:
Ghoomar is another popular dance form of Rajasthan.
In Hindu culture, it is performed during the festival of Navratri and is associated with the worship of Goddess Durga.
D_hi: गोमर एक मजानों के संतोष होता है।
question_en: Which dance form is associated with the worship of Goddess Durga and is popular in Rajasthan?
question_hi: दीवाई के मजान कौने संस्करण होते हैं।
question_en: Which dance form is associated with the worship of Goddess Durga and is popular in Rajasthan?

options.option_en_explanation: Ghoomar is associated with the worship of Goddess Durga and is widely performed in Rajasthan during festivals
options.option_hi_explanation: गोमर दीवाई के संतोष होते हैं।

options.question_en: Rajasthani Dance or Ghoomar is popular in Rajasthan?

options.option_en_explanation: Ghoomar is a traditional dance form of Rajasthan.
